title: BingoToken - Play-To-Earn
description: Online Bingo should be about having fun as part of a community, not about gambling. How can we keep Bingo fun without players losing money?
solution: BingoToken will aim to disrupt the Bingo gaming sector by incentivizing callers to give real money/crypto prizes without players gambling.
experience: Our team has extensive and varied experience in Software Development, Gaming, Blockchain, Marketing and Company Management. POC completed.
